All appropriate administrative collection procedures should be taken before initiating these Trust Fund Compliance procedures. For instance, appropriate levies and Notices of Federal Tax Lien should be considered ﬁrst, as well as timely and appropriate trust fund recovery penalty inves- tigations. With approval from local counsel, it may also be appropriate to pursue a civil injunction while a taxpayer is exercising its collection due process hearing and appeal rights under IRC Section 6320 or 6330.
